summary: This is a mod that combines a bunch of Tropical skyrim mods into one Bsa and Esm master file. Making it easier to install and remove Tropical skyrim assets. Or even helping make modding with a Tropical theme easier!
descriptionHtml:
These are all the files I combined into one Esp and A Bsa for the loose files. I then turned the Esp into a Master file to make it easier to make mods with a complete Tropical skyrim look and feel without a ton of loose files... Also makes installing the Tropical Overhaul easier and removal as simple as unclicking the Esm!! No more dual installs or worrying about a mod manager to install your mods for you... Also makes it more compatable with mesh and texture changes from other mods due to the lack of the loose meshes and textures within this one...
Every time you see this symbol = It means a mod that was added

=Tropical Skyrim -- A Climate Overhaul
Created by Soolie
=No Floating Ice or Rocks for Tropical Skyrim
Created by unearthlycrowbar
=Tropical Skyrim - Elephants Instead of Mammoths
Created by GendunDrup
=Tropical Animals - Horse Replacers and Wild Zebra
Tropical Zebras - Replacers and Herds PROTECTED STALLIONS
Contains the replacers for the horses as well as wild zebras. The stallions are "protected" in this version.
Created by Rose and William
=Tropical Skyrim - Fixed Beehives
Created by Amadar
=Tropical Skyrim II
=Birds Elevated Flight Route
=New Replacer for Anvil Giant Trunk
=New Replacer for Anvil Palm Trunk
=Tropical Riften Marketplace
Created by Fredlaus
=New Solitude Tropical edition
=New Windhelm summer and tropical edition V2
=New Winterhold Tropical Edition
=New Whiterun Tropical edition
=New riften tropical editionv2 including ratway complete
Created by Tamikonelf
=Footsteps - Summer Tropical No snow overhauls Sound replacer
Created by Tujestem
=Tropical Skyrim - Mod - More Textures
Bards Tools (Retexture of the Drum, Lute and Flute)
Steel Arrows Texture Replacer
Tropical Forsworn (Replaces Forsworn armor)
Created by Cat_Woman1989
=Solstheim Skaal and Hunter Tropical Outfits for Tropical Skyrim
(Swaps Skaal and Hunter outfits for looser summer clothing)
Hide Armor = Edla, Baldor Iron-Shaper, Morwen, Deor Woodcutter, Nikulas
Iron/Hide Combo Armor = Wulf Wild-Blood
Regular Farm Clothing = Finna
Regular Child's Clothing = Aeta
Monk's Hooded Robes = Storn
Hunter (Hide/Pelt) Armor = Netch Hunters
The exception is Frea, because she's a potential follower and her personal armorset is left untouched for a good reason.
Created by Sa547
author: Me
